00037 #ifndef EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_
00038 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_vector.h"
00041 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00042 #include "egs_rndm.h"
00043 #include "egs_alias_table.h"
00044 
00045 #ifdef WIN32
00046 
00047 #ifdef BUILD_SOURCE_COLLECTION_DLL
00048 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00049 #else
00050 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00051 #endif
00052 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_LOCAL
00053 
00054 #else
00055 
00056 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY
00057 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00058 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility ("hidden")))

00060 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT
00061 #define EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_LOCAL

00065 
00083 class EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_SourceCollection :
00084           public EGS_BaseSource {
00085 
00086 public:
00087 
00093     EGS_SourceCollection(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S,
00094             const vector<EGS_Float> &prob,
00095             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00096             EGS_BaseSource(Name,f), nsource(0), count(0) {
00097             setUp(S,prob); };
00098 
00103     EGS_SourceCollection(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00104     ~EGS_SourceCollection() {
00105         if( nsource > 0 ) {
00106             for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) EGS_Object::deleteObject(sources[j]);
00107             delete [] sources; delete table; delete [] p;
00108             delete [] last_cases;
00109         }
00110     };
00111 
00112     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00113             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00114             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00115         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00116         EGS_I64 this_case = sources[j]->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00117         count += this_case - last_cases[j];
00118         last_cases[j] = this_case;
00119         return count;
00120     };
00121     EGS_Float getEmax() const { return Emax; };
00122     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00123         EGS_Float flu = 0;
00124         for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) flu += sources[j]->getFluence();
00125         return flu;
00126     };
00127     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00128         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::storeState(data); if( !res ) return res;
00129         res = egsStoreI64(data,count); if( !res ) return res; data << " ";
00130         for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00131             res = egsStoreI64(data,last_cases[j]); if( !res ) return res; data << " ";
00132             if( !sources[j]->storeState(data) ) return false;
00133         }
00134         return true;
00135     };
00136     bool setState(istream &data) {
00137         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::setState(data); if( !res ) return res;
00138         res = egsGetI64(data,count); if( !res ) return res;
00139         for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00140             res = egsGetI64(data,last_cases[j]); if( !res ) return res;
00141             if( !sources[j]->setState(data) ) return false;
00142         }
00143         return true;
00144     }
00145 
00146     void resetCounter() {
00147         EGS_BaseSource::resetCounter();
00148         count = 0;
00149         for(int j=0; j<nsource; ++j) { last_cases[j] = 0; sources[j]->resetCounter(); }
00150     };
00151 
00152     virtual bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00153         EGS_I64 tmp;
00154         bool res = EGS_BaseSource::addState(data_in); if( !res ) return res;
00155         res = egsGetI64(data_in,tmp); if( !res ) return res; count += tmp;
00156         for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00157             res = egsGetI64(data_in,tmp); if( !res ) return res;
00158             last_cases[j] += tmp;
00159             if( !sources[j]->addState(data_in) ) return false;
00160         }
00161         return true;
00162     };
00163 
00164     bool isValid() const { return (nsource > 0); };
00165 
00166 protected:
00167 
00168     int nsource;
00169     EGS_BaseSource **sources;  
00170     EGS_AliasTable *table;     
00171     EGS_I64        *last_cases;
00172     EGS_Float      *p;         
00173     EGS_Float Emax;            
00174     EGS_I64        count;      
00175 
00176     void setUp(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S, const vector<EGS_Float> &);
00177 
00178 };
00179 
00180 #endif
